pis_title: Interior Latex Paint — Product Information Sheet (PIS)
reference_image: Subtle wall texture with smooth matte finish
Soft-focus living room wall with wainscoting detail
Muted sofa silhouette to emphasize wall quality
Backdrop of beautiful painted walls with a luxe sofa
Faint painted ceiling corner with natural light
product_overview: Calyco Nova is a premium, low-VOC interior acrylic emulsion delivering rich, fade-resistant colour and excellent hide for walls and ceilings. Its water-based formula levels well, cleans up with soap and water, and is an eco-conscious choice; apply two coats for best results.
short_description: Vibrant, high-pigment colour. Low VOC. Water-based for safer, smarter living.
positioning: Chosen by discerning designers and homeowners for rich, lasting colour and unmatched interior performance.
key_features: Refined colour with smooth, low-glare matte

features_benefits.benefit: Rich, vibrant shades with uniform appearance.
Two-coat uniformity on primed interiors; saves time and material.
Withstands routine cleaning with mild soap and water.
Safer indoor air during and after painting.
Reliable bond to primed drywall, plaster, masonry and wood.
Low-sheen anti-glare finish that hides minor surface imperfections.

recommended_use.intro: Interior topcoat for properly prepared, primed substrates:
items: Plaster, POP and drywall walls & ceilings
Previously painted surfaces in sound condition

application_system.label: Primer/Sealer
application_system.purpose: Seal porosity, unify absorption, promote adhesion.

coverage: 10–12 m²/L per coat on smooth, sealed surface
thinner: Clean water; brush/roller preferred. Avoid over-thinning.

technical_data.Colours: Neutral tones; tintable via Calyco Colour Studio
technical_data.Warranty: 5 years (film integrity) when applied as directed
technical_data.Shelf Life: 24 months (store cool, away from frost and direct sun)

recommended_substrates.description: Interior walls and ceilings after priming

surface_preparation: Ensure surfaces are clean, dry and sound; remove dust and loose material.
De-gloss glossy areas; repair cracks/holes; spot-prime bare areas.
Prime new/porous masonry and drywall with Calyco Interior Primer/Sealer.
application: Brush or roller recommended; spray optional with proper thinning/setup.
Stir well; maintain a wet edge; apply 2 uniform coats.
Avoid over-thinning; follow recoat times; ensure ventilation.
Clean tools with soap & water immediately after use.

limitations.Protection Period: Protect freshly painted surfaces from moisture for 24 hours
limitations.Application Conditions: Avoid direct sun or hot surfaces; work in manageable sections

storage_safety: Keep in a cool place, tightly sealed.
Store away from frost and direct sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children and pets.

safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Rinse with clean water for 15 minutes; seek advice if irritation persists.
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Move to fresh air; avoid breathing spray mist.
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Do not induce vomiting; seek medical attention.
safety_first_aid.Ventilation: Ensure adequate airflow during application and drying.
safety_first_aid.Waste Disposal: Do not pour into drains; dispose per local regulations.

environmental_commitment: Low-VOC, water-borne, solvent-free formula in recyclable packaging.

recommended_uses: Ideal for plaster, POP and drywall walls and ceilings

specs_summary.application_instructions: Brush or roller recommended; avoid over-thinning
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Ensure surface is clean and dry; prime porous areas
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Keep in cool place, tightly sealed
